27183.summary: Some customers in the Kingsway Park area of Moose Jaw are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27183.title: Oct 10 – Moose Jaw (Kingsway Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
